hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) 15-Minute Overextension Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: During BULL or NEUTRAL regimes, when a meme coin (DOGE or PEPE) experiences a rapid 15-minute price move >7% on elevated volume (>150% of 20-period avg), fading that move (shorting if up, buying if down) at the candle close will yield a positive mean reversion within the next 1-2 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins are driven by retail sentiment and often exhibit sharp, overextended moves on hype/fear. These moves frequently exhaust quickly due to profit-taking and lack of sustained fundamental driver, leading to swift partial retracements.
entry_conditions: Enter at the close of that 15-min candle in the opposite direction

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 50% of the initial 7% move
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price extends another 3% against the position

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median retracement after entry is less than 25% of the initial move, or the trend continues >50% of the time within the 2-hour window.
